aiInitiative.title: Beat Aware – AI-Powered Heart Attack Prediction Wearable
aiInitiative.summary: A smart wearable device and mobile app that uses real-time sensor data and machine learning to predict early signs of heart attacks and send instant alerts to users and emergency contacts.
aiInitiative.role: Backend Developer – Firebase integration, ML model handling, and real-time data processing.
features: ML-based heart attack risk prediction (LSTM + RF)
Firebase backend with secure data storage
aiInitiative.status: Machine learning model trained and tested. UI integration and testing in progress.
